title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ Members who've signed up for this month (October 3 - November 6) will also receive:

— The HVY Nightshark (Off-Road)
— Access to The Vinewood Club
— The Demon Biker Jacket and more exclusive clothing
— 2X Rewards on Halloween Adversary Modes
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
